Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to price gouging
Summary: Relates to price gouging; imposes criminal penalties for price gouging; removes language relating to the declaration of a state of emergency; increases civil penalty; authorizes a district attorney to enforce provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง396-r, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to price gouging
